lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I'm sooo Boooooored.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Why did I agree to helping Lynn on this again?
*CRASH*

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: What the- Is there someone else here?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Oh. Just some policemen trashing the place.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Wait, that's sus as hell! They're not suppose to be here, this is MY stakeout.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: And NO ONE can outstake my stakeout.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Something just fell out of that bag.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Looks like a flash drive... Must be important.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Lynn will thank me later.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Now if I can just sneak past this officer...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: SNEAK MODE: HALF DIVE. START.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Alright...!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Evidence secured!
*CLANK*

lines.name: Suspicious Cop
lines.text: I think I heard something!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (Uh oh. I better hide somewhere...)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (Oh this is perfect!)

lines.name: Suspicious Cop
lines.text: Huh. Nevermind, it was just a trash can.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...The Domain of the Trash Can...

lines.name: Suspicious Cop
lines.text: Maybe we should head back. Tell Mr. Evidens we couldn't find it here.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (Haha! I can't believe that actually worked!)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I'm a genius!

lines.name: Suspicious Cop
lines.text: ...Did that trash can just talk?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Oh heck.
-- At the Police Station --

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Unhand me you criminals!

lines.name: Suspicious Cop
lines.text: Uhh, we're kinda the police you realize.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: ...Let go of the idiot.

lines.name: Suspicious Cop
lines.text: We found this hoodlum trashing a crime scene!

lines.name: Suspicious Cop
lines.text: When we got there, the place was in tatters!

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Even if they DID do that...

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: They... were working for me. Leave them out of this.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...Huh?

lines.name: Suspicious Cop
lines.text: Fine. They can go free.

lines.name: Suspicious Cop
lines.text: But thanks for giving yourself away, Flatfoot. Deuce Evidens is gonna have your head!
-- Suspicious Cop walks off --

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Flatfoot?

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: That's my last name.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: ...Locke, did you really do it?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: No, I would never! I saw them ransacking the crime scene, and I found something that could be important, and-

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I'm sorry. I shouldn't have gone in.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I messed this up.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: No, I'm sorry. You thought you were doing the right thing.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I should have warned you about...

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Well, the less you know the better. I don't want to get you in any more trouble.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Thanks, but-

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Did you manage to grab what you went in for?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Uh, yeah. It's right here. A flash drive flew out during their search.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I don't know what's on it, or if it will be useful.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Thank you. Here's your payment.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I botched the job. You really don't have to.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Hey, it's okay.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Go get yourself something nice to eat.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Wait, so who is Deuce Evidens?

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I said go.
-- Outside the Police Station --

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: She knows I'm just going to Doogle that name when I get home right?
